question.question: Which of the following is the primary goal in the initial management of septic shock?
question.option_a: Administering broad-spectrum antibiotics to treat the underlying infection
question.option_b: Rapidly restoring blood pressure and organ perfusion through fluid resuscitation
question.option_c: Immediately performing a full diagnostic workup to identify the source of infection
question.option_d: Providing supportive care to manage symptoms and prevent complications
